results.title: Simvastatin modulates estrogen signaling in uterine leiomyoma via regulating receptor palmitoylation, trafficking and degradation.
results.text_hl: Thus, our data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ modulates several E2/@GENE_EREG @GENE_2069 @@@ER@@@ signaling targets with potential implications in @<m>DISEASE_Leiomyoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007889 @@@leiomyoma@@@ therapy and beyond.
